mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CustMst VALUES(#{CustId}, #{CustNm}, #{OrgCd}, #{CallbackURL}, #{ApiKey}, #{PriContactNm}, #{PriContactTel}, #{PriContactEmail}, #{SecContactNm}, #{SecContactTel}, #{SecContactEmail}, #{TxSequence}, #{InUse}, NOW(), NULL)
